Plot: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.
Title: Transcendence
Actors: Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall, Paul Bettany, Cillian Murphy
tomatoConsensus: In his directorial debut, ace cinematographer Wally Pfister remains a distinctive visual stylist, but Transcendence's thought-provoking themes exceed the movie's narrative grasp.
